entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Kawartha Lakes (Lindsay)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:10 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -0.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peterborough Municipal Airport 1:27 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -0.5°C
Pressure: 100.8 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 78 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -3.8°C
Wind: E 21 km/h gust 35 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow or ice pellets mixed with freezing rain beginning near noon. Local snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
